titles: An elegie on the death of the Right Honourable Iohn Warner, late Lord Mayor of London.
author: Rich, Jeremiah, d. 1660?
notes: Signed at end: Ieremiah Rich. Fecit.
Verse - "The sweetest, fairest, and the best of flowers,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Warner, John, --  Sir, d. 1648 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
